properties.name: api.key
properties.description: The api needed for making requests to api.openweathermap.org.

properties.name: cache.flush-key
properties.description: A secret key that will be used to validate against when requesting a cache flush. This will be used in requests to /api/v1/cacheflush?secret={cache.flush-key}.

properties.name: cache.disabled
properties.description: Set this property to true to disable caching when app is started.
